column1: Topic title: Be grateful for Aramco deal  minister tells Rafizi

column8: http://www.malaysiakini.com/news/377868MalaysiaKiniBe grateful for Aramco deal, minister tells Rafizi to stop playing politicsShakira Buang     Minister in the Prime Minister's Department Abdul Rahman Dahlan has called on PKR vice-president Rafizi Ramli to be grateful for Saudi Aramco's investment in Petronas' Refinery and Petrochemical Integrated Development (Rapid) complex in Pengerang, Johor."Do you people still believe Rafizi?" he responded when questioned on the opposition lawmaker's remarks concerning the US$7 billion (RM31 billion) agreement.On March 28, Rafizi had asked if Abdul Rahman's intervention had led to Petronas paying a higher price for crude oil from Saudi Aramco...For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year (full news access)or RM420 a year (full news + full archive access).
